channel.title: Help me please?
channel.description:
Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 566 at Stream.readUnsignedByte(Stream.java:108) at ObjectManager.method189(ObjectManager.java:1329) at client.method54(client.java:2800) at client.loadingStages(client.java:2771) at client.mainGameProcessor(client.java:3188) at client.processGameLoop(client.java:2346) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:101) at client.run(client.java:4772) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Error: od_ex null
Followed these tuts and I recieved these errros when I tried to log into my server http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/379566-508-map-locations.html
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/323269-index-repacking.html
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/363270-galkons-508-maps-fixed.html
Was wondering whats going on i had no errors? I packed everything good

item.title: Help me please?
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

error in your client.java clearly… Depends, if you’ve gone too far you might not just be able to fix the errors… but, honestly if you use eclipse like me, you could pretty much fix any error… I suggest either getting eclipse or finding a copy of your client.java before you proceded with the tuts… however, look into IDE eclipse… it will help you get far bud.

Read full topic
